20101224000024.000|20101224000026.000|TR0|warn things better shift to the right in

20101224000807.000|20101224000809.000|TR0|about the Democrats after the Obama 
20101224000809.000|20101224000811.000|TR0|victory, when they were so headstrong, we 
20101224000811.000|20101224000812.000|TR0|control everything.  But governing is a

20101224000814.000|20101224000816.000|TR0|
20101224000816.000|20101224000818.000|TR0|CORNELL BELCHER, PRESIDENT, BRILLIANT 
20101224000818.000|20101224000820.000|TR0|CORNERS RESEARCH  &  STRATEGIES:  It is a 
20101224000820.000|20101224000821.000|TR0|lot harder than campaigning.

20101224003423.000|20101224003425.000|TR0|
20101224003425.000|20101224003427.000|TR0|KING:  One of the more surprising players 
20101224003427.000|20101224003428.000|TR0|in this year-end lame duck sessions is of 
20101224003428.000|20101224003430.000|TR0|Congress, well, was to be one of the lame 
20101224003430.000|20101224003432.000|TR0|ducks, meaning one of the lawmakers who 
20101224003432.000|20101224003434.000|TR0|lost and would not to be back next year.

20101224003437.000|20101224003439.000|TR0|Lisa Murkowski ran as write-in candidate
